author: yeckang
body:
#### PR description:

* Reducing the size of the GEMDigiSimLinks
* Because the GEM is not supporting multi bx readout during Run 3, we made a bx filter in GEMDigitizer.

#### PR validation:

* The branch has tested with the following commands to check if it works well in Run 3 and Phase 2 conditions
```
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 11611.0
runTheMatrix.py -w upgrade -l 35811.0
```
* The code quality has checked with following commands.
```
scram build code-check
scram build code-format
scram build -k -j 16 check-headers
```
title: Reducing the GEMDigiSimLink size and turning off gem multi bx readout during Run3
